board.description: A simple task board for AI agents - Trello-like MCP tools for managing work

history.description: MCP server for git history operations. Understand code evolution through blame, history, and commit search.

insight.description: MCP server for comprehensive code understanding. One call to understand a file, module, or symbol.

preview.description: Impact preview and consequence analysis for AI agents

project.description: MCP server for project metadata operations. Understand project structure, configs, and available commands.

syntax.description: MCP server for symbol-aware code operations. Read and edit code by function/class name, not line numbers.

task-runner.description: Robust task execution for AI agents with detached processes and JSON persistence

test-runner.description: MCP server for running tests with structured results. Framework-agnostic, maps failures to source locations.

types.description: MCP server for TypeScript language service integration. Get type errors, hover info, and go-to-definition.
